DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine Positive Prevention PLUS teen pregnancy prevention program impact abstinence , birth control use , likelihood become pregnant .
DOC.detailed_description: A clustered randomized control trial ( CRCT ) employ participate high school site randomly assign either treatment group implement Positive Prevention PLUS program control group . Students complete self-administered survey baseline ( prior program implementation ) 6 month follow-up survey ( post program implementation ) . Eligible student sample include male female 9th-grade student 21 high school enrol mandatory 9th-grade health , science , physical education class , district assigns student randomly . Of 7,042 eligible student , 4,267 receive parental consent enrol study . Outcome variable include initiation sexual activity , ever pregnant , birth control use .
DOC.criteria: Must parental consent eligible school site .
